channel.title: B161 on Suburban Backyard Astro Sights
channel.description: Recent content in B161 on Suburban Backyard Astro Sights

item.title: The Elephant's Trunk Nebula
item.description: The Elephant’s Trunk Nebula (IC 1396A) is a twisted sinuous structure of interstellar gas and dust that we see back-lit and ionized by intense radiation coming from a nearby massive star. Red light from ionized hydrogen makes it stand out amid the other streams and swirls of dark nebulae.
